item.title: 市场低迷，中美痛苦阈值面临考验
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特（Malcolm Scott），驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天，我们将关注唐纳德-特朗普的关税措施所带来的市场和经济影响将如何考验华盛顿和北京领导人的痛苦阈值。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at how market and economic fallout from Donald Trump’s tariffs will test the pain threshold of leaders in Washington and Beijing. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普的紧急关税从 "解放 "到诉讼
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）及其高级经济顾问周日发出了一系列明确的信号，表示即使在金融市场大肆屠杀的情况下，他们也不打算放弃关税计划。【原文：US President Donald Trump and his top economic advisers sent a series of clear signals Sunday that they have no plans to abandon his tariff plans even as the carnage in financial markets piles up.】

item.title: 印度提高燃油税，同时保持泵价稳定
item.description: 印度从周二开始将柴油和汽油税每升提高 2 卢比，这一举措将有助于在全球原油价格下跌的情况下增加印度的财政收入。【原文：India increased taxes on diesel and gasoline by 2 rupees a liter beginning Tuesday, a step that will help boost its revenue amid falling global crude oil prices.】

item.title: 本田高管被指行为不当后辞职
item.description: 本田汽车公司的一位最高级管理人员辞职，因为该汽车制造商的董事会调查了他在工作时间以外的一次社交聚会上有不当行为的指控。【原文：One of Honda Motor Co.’s senior-most executives resigned after the automaker’s board investigated allegations he’d engaged in inappropriate conduct during a social gathering outside of work hours.】

item.description: 德国希望欧盟考虑使用其最强大的工具来报复美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战。【原文：Germany wants the European Union to consider using its most powerful tool to retaliate against the US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 特朗普关税激怒市场，埃及英镑跌至新低
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税激怒全球市场后，埃及货币创下自去年贬值以来的最大跌幅，创下历史新低。【原文：Egypt’s currency plunged the most since last year’s devaluation to hit a record low after US President Donald Trump’s tariffs roiled global markets.】

item.title: 杰米-戴蒙表示应尽快解决关税政策问题
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）敦促尽快解决美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策所引发的不确定性，并警告说，美国的长期经济联盟可能会出现 "灾难性 "的分裂。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon urged a quick resolution to the uncertainties sparked by President Donald Trump’s tariffs and warned against a potentially “disastrous” fragmentation of America’s long-term economic alliances.】

item.title: 科技股处于 "风暴眼"，交易员为更大损失做好准备
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普坚称不会在上周发起的关税大潮中退缩，市场专业人士正在为受关税影响最大的公司进行最坏情况的预测。他们的预期是严峻的。【原文：With President Donald Trump insisting he won’t back down from the barrage of tariffs unleashed last week, market professionals are gaming out worst-case scenarios for the companies most exposed to the levies. What they’re expecting is grim.】

item.title: 谷歌人工智能搜索的转变让网站制作者感到 "被背叛
item.description: 2024 年 3 月，网站所有者摩根-麦克布莱德（Morgan McBride）在她装修了一半的厨房里为谷歌广告拍照，庆祝搜索巨头帮助她的家族企业发展壮大。【原文：In March 2024, website owner Morgan McBride was posing for photos in her half-renovated kitchen for a Google ad celebrating the ways the search giant had helped her family’s business grow.】

item.title: 股市术语表：驾驭市场崩溃的术语
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）顶住压力扭转其贸易关税政策，主要经济体面临经济衰退的风险，全球市场动荡难测。【原文：With US President Donald Trump resisting pressure to reverse his trade tariffs and major economies facing the risk of a recession, it’s hard to navigate the turbulence in global markets.】

item.title: 泰国暂时禁止卖空以平息股市
item.description: 随着美国全面关税的影响波及全球市场，泰国将暂时禁止卖空股票，并收紧其他股票交易规则，以抑制市场波动。【原文：Thailand will temporarily ban short selling of stocks and tighten other share trading rules to curb volatility as the fallout from the US’s sweeping tariffs roil global markets.】

item.title: 全球经济衰退，俄罗斯旗舰石油产品乌拉尔油价跌至 50 美元附近
item.description: 随着克里姆林宫为乌克兰战争增加国防开支，全球石油价格暴跌导致俄罗斯旗舰级乌拉尔石油的价格跌至每桶 50 美元，从而增加了国家预算的压力。【原文：A plunge in global oil prices has driven down the price of Russia’s flagship grade Urals toward $50 a barrel, raising pressure on the state budget as the Kremlin ramps up defense spending for its war on Ukraine.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税立场将在与以色列内塔尼亚胡的会晤中接受考验
item.description: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡与唐纳德-特朗普的会晤将让世界各国领导人了解美国总统在关税问题上让步的意愿。【原文：Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s meeting with Donald Trump will give world leaders a sense of how willing the US president is to budge on tariffs.】

item.title: 市场大跌之际，图斯克敦促华沙 "不要做出紧张决定
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克（Donald Tusk）说，华沙股市有 "政治和经济稳定 "作后盾，波兰投资者应避免在全球市场溃败之际做出 "紧张的决定"。【原文：Polish investors should avoid making “nervous decisions” amid a rout in global markets as Warsaw stocks are backed by “political and economic stability,” Prime Minister Donald Tusk said.】

item.title: 特朗普称 900 亿美元的澳大利亚养老金 "不利于商业发展
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金之一，规模达 1,490 亿澳元（约合 896 亿美元）的 UniSuper 上调了美国经济衰退的可能性，并计划在唐纳德-特朗普总统征收关税以及由此引发的市场混乱之后，削减其在美国的风险敞口。【原文：One of Australia’s largest pension funds, A$149 billion ($89.6 billion) UniSuper, has upgraded its probability of a US recession and plans to cut its exposure to the country in the wake of President Donald Trump’s tariffs and the resulting market chaos.】

item.title: 从汽车到小玩意特朗普关税给美国消费者带来的损失
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提高关税最有可能导致的结果是美国人支付更多的杂货和消费品，但这并不是唯一的结果。【原文：While Americans doling out more for groceries and consumer goods would be the most probable outcome of President Donald Trump’s tariff hikes, it’s not the only one.】

item.title: 莱茵金属下挫，欧洲防务股首当其冲遭抛售
item.description: 在周一欧洲股市的大跌中，国防类股首当其冲，因为风险资产的大范围出逃使这一今年以来表现最佳的板块蒙受损失。【原文：Defense stocks bore the brunt of Monday’s selloff across European equity markets as a broad flight from risk assets sucked the air from what has been the region’s top-performing sector this year.】

item.title: 软银计划在动荡中为散户投资者发行最大规模债券
item.description: 软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp. ）正计划面向散户投资者进行有史以来规模最大的债券销售，尽管由于美国关税引发全球金融市场震荡，市场正变得厌恶风险。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. is planning its biggest-ever sale of bonds for retail investors even as markets are becoming risk averse due to US tariffs rattling global financial markets.】

item.title: 菲律宾贸易部长称菲律宾考虑削减对美国产品的关税
item.description: 菲律宾贸易部长克里斯蒂娜-罗克（Cristina Roque）表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面征税之后，菲律宾正在考虑降低对美国产品的关税。【原文：The Philippines is considering reducing tariffs on US products after President Donald Trump’s sweeping levies, according to Trade Secretary Cristina Roque.】

item.title: 日本考虑支持阿拉斯加液化天然气作为美国贸易协议的一部分
item.description: 作为与美国谈判贸易协议努力的一部分，日本将考虑在阿拉斯加投资一个拖延已久的价值 440 亿美元的液化天然气项目。【原文：Japan would consider investing in a long-delayed $44 billion liquefied natural gas project in Alaska as part of an effort to negotiate a trade deal with the US.】

item.title: 由于担心经济衰退，交易员押注美联储将再减息五次
item.description: 由于美国政府的贸易关税引发了对全球经济衰退的担忧，交易员预计美联储今年将再降息五次。【原文：Traders expect the Federal Reserve to slash interest rates another five times this year as the US administration’s trade tariffs ignite fears of a global recession.】
